August 2017 to Present Interface with field engineering sales organization and customers to handle tactical requests which support customer design requirements and consult on the best electronic board level positioning or parts services solutions resources training and develop technical escalation paths Specialize in Intelligent Connectivity to deliver IoT solutions such as Bluetooth WiFi LoRa sensors and Controllers Deployment Analyst May 2016 to August 2016 Deployed MS Office 365 to 50 of global workforce 28500 users one month ahead of benchmark date Drafted test cases and conducted
